name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.job.cache.limit.max-resources-mb
description:
The maximum size (in MB) a map reduce job is allowed to submit
    for localization via files, libjars, archives, and jobjar command line
    arguments and through the distributed cache. If set to 0 the limit is
    ignored.

name: dfs.namenode.list.reencryption.status.num.responses
description:
When listing re-encryption status, the maximum number of zones
    that will be returned in a batch. Fetching the list incrementally in
    batches improves namenode performance.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.connection.timeout.ms
description: Connection timeout for probing dead node in milliseconds.

name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns
description:
The Secondary NameNode or CheckpointNode will create a checkpoint
  of the namespace every 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns' transactions, regardless
  of whether 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.period' has expired.

name: mapreduce.job.local-fs.single-disk-limit.check.interval-ms
description: Interval of disk limit check to run in ms.
